fi.tuni.mentalsurvival

Class Hud

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.mentalsurvival.Hud

  • public class Hud
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the on-screen HUD including e.g sanity bar, joystick, story dialogs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hud(MentalSurvival game)
      Create the HUD layout-

      • updateMission

        public void updateMission(int woodToCollect,
                          int ropesToCollect,
                          int woodCount,
                          int ropeCount,
                          java.lang.String collectString)
        Update the mission that is shown on the top left on screen. Calculates the value from given integers.
        Parameters:
        woodToCollect - amount of wood to be collected
        ropesToCollect - amount of ropes to be collected
        woodCount - amount of wood in backpack
        ropeCount - amount of ropes in backpack
        collectString - the string to show (COLLECT/KERÄÄ)

      • updateSanityBar

      • updateBackpack

        public void updateBackpack(int woodAmount,
                           int ropeAmount,
                           int matchAmount,
                           boolean isWaterBottleFull,
                           java.lang.String emptyString,
                           java.lang.String fullString)
        Update the backpack contents based on the player's values
        Parameters:
        woodAmount - amount of wood in backpack
        ropeAmount - amount of ropes in backpack
        matchAmount - amount of matches in backpack
        isWaterBottleFull - true if water bottle full, false if empty
        emptyString - string to be shown if the bottle is empty
        fullString - string to be shown if the bottle is full
